meanings.definition: The quality of being difficult or requiring great effort.
meanings.sent1: The arduousnesses of climbing the steep mountain made me tired.
meanings.sent2: The arduousnesses of completing the marathon left me feeling accomplished.
meanings.sent3: The arduousnesses of untangling my headphones always makes me feel like a detective.
meanings.sent4: The arduousnesses of navigating through the dense forest of paperwork overwhelmed me.
meanings.sent5: The arduousnesses of memorizing all the multiplication tables seemed never-ending.

meanings.definition: The state of being strenuous or laborious.
meanings.sent1: The arduousnesses of carrying heavy boxes strained my muscles.
meanings.sent2: The arduousnesses of cleaning the entire house wore me out.
meanings.sent3: The arduousnesses of trying to juggle too many tasks at once felt like a circus act gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: The arduousnesses of running the marathon felt like a battle against my own limits.
meanings.sent5: The arduousnesses of building a house from scratch required immense dedication and hard work.
